      • getErrorMessageForInvalidIdentifiers

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getErrorMessageForInvalidIdentifiers(java.lang.String identifierText,
                                                                                        java.lang.String identifierDescription)
        Produces a specific error message if the identifier is invalid (e.g., contains linebreaks, invisible unicode chars, or is empty). The error message contains the (truncated) text if it is not empty.
        Parameters:
        identifierText - the text of the identifier (e.g., "x" or "foo")
        identifierDescription - a description of what this identifier should be (e.g., "Group name" or "Id"). This is used at the beginning of the error message and therefore should start with an uppercase letter.

      • padSlash

        public static java.lang.String padSlash(java.lang.String url)
        Ensures that the given URL ends in a slash.
